thread.title: A Comedian Who Has Allegedly Lied About Being A "Millennial" For Years Will Perform At An Inaugural Ball - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: A Comedian Who Has Allegedly Lied About Being A "Millennial" For Years Will Perform At An Inaugural Ball - BuzzFeed News

author: Julia Reinstein
title: A Comedian Who Has Allegedly Lied About Being A "Millennial" For Years Will Perform At An Inaugural Ball - BuzzFeed News
text:
In 2012, he told the New York Times he was 31 and the Wall Street Journal he was 36. However, Nainan allegedly is actually 55 years old, as the Daily Beast reported earlier this month.
A website even exists called ComedianDanNainanIsOver50YearsOldAndHisFollowersAreFake.com.
When presented with multiple documents proving his true age, Nainan did not relent, telling the Daily Beast reporter “the mistake is in [his] birth record.”
ID: 10340144 3. The All American Ball, a major inaugural ball, announced on their website that Nainan will perform at their Jan. 19 event. View this image ›
The All American Ball is not officially associated with the presidential inauguration, despit many people thinking they are one in the same.
Donald Trump will not necessarily attend the All American Ball, though the event website says the President-elect is expected to attend one or a few balls.
ID: 10339686 4. Nainan also performed at this ball in 2013, when Obama was elected. Facebook Post . Facebook: permalink.php Nainan told BuzzFeed News he has “proudly performed at 12 inaugural galas in 2009 and 2013,” and is “nonpartisan and [does not support one side more than the other.”
“I voted for Barack Obama in 2008 in 2012 and have absolutely no regrets about doing so,” he said.
Nainan declined to comment on whether or not he voted for Trump.
ID: 10339785 5. People can’t believe Nainan’s performing at the inaugural event. Wait no just kidding, they actually totally can. Of course. OF COURSE
— Patrick Monahan (@pattymo) ID: 10339757 122-year-old "millennial" "comedian" Dan Nainan is performing at the All American Ball inauguration event. Because,… https://t.co/ByZvRZX29Z
— Kounterpropos (@kounterpropos) ID: 10339778 7. And no one can get over Nainan’s prolific bio, which is twice the length of fellow event attendee Buzz Aldrin. Dan Nainan's bio on the Inaugural Ball page is 948 words long. Buzz Aldrin's is 475.
— CAFE (@cafedotcom) ID: 10339758 8. And it’s honestly just a wild ride from start to finish: easily the best line in dan nainan's inaugural ball bio
— brenna (@br3nn4) ID: 10339277 9. What a time to be alive, folks. dan nainan: love 2 perform at the inauguration. i flew here on a private jet president donald trump: this is the funniest youngest comedian
— BRANDON WARDELL (@BRANDONWARDELL) ID: 10339909 u laugh at dan nainan bc u think he's a liar. bc u think he's a joke. well, he's actually a modern day prophet
— BRANDON WARDELL (@BRANDONWARDELL) ID: 10339285 I have no idea who Dan Nainan is, so he fits in nicely with the rest of the inaugural lineup.
— Ghost of Mae West ☕️ (@Wyndgrove) ID: 10339918 12. The All American Ball did not immediately return request for comment. ID: 10340072 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
Julia Reinstein is a reporter for BuzzFeed News and is based in New York. Contact Julia Reinstein at julia.reinstein@buzzfeed.com . Got a confidential tip? Submit it here .
